resources.string: Foreground notification required for internal alert sync.

Before you can add an event, you must add at least one Calendar account to your device and make a calendar visible. Touch Add Account to add an account (if you just added an account, wait for it to finish syncing and try again). Or touch Cancel and make sure at least one calendar is visible.
There is no maps app installed

string-array.name: quick_response_defaults
string-array.item: Running just a couple of minutes late.
Go ahead and start without me.
Sorry, I can\'t make it. We\'ll have to reschedule.

resources.string: Change all events in the series
Change this and all future events
Max number of lines in event
Remove all the searches you\'ve performed

Events with #alarm tag anywhere in the title or description would use this notification category.
It uses Alarm sound stream, thus on many devices would produce sound notification even in silent mode.
On top of that, notification sound would be repeated every few minutes.
Additionally you can enable this notification channel to bypass DND mode if you wish to get always notified about events marked with #alarm.
Displays calendars and event times in your home time zone when traveling

Display all notifications are ongoing\nIf this option is disabled, swiping of the notification away only clears the system notification area, while event still has to be marked as done (via swipe) inside the app
